In a whimsical town, there existed a school unlike any other, where pets donned glasses and carried briefcases. Each classroom was a kingdom ruled by furry or feathered educators. Miss Whiskers, the wise old cat, taught literature, her soothing purr inspiring creativity. Mr. Barkley, the energetic dog, led gym class, his tail wagging as he demonstrated the perfect jump. The parrot, Polly, was the language master, teaching students to communicate with chirps and squawks. Every day was an adventure filled with laughter and learning, as students discovered that wisdom could come in all shapes and sizes, especially with a wagging tail or a gentle purr.
